greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Characteristic function for A000960.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..9889
mathematica: b[n_] := (For[m = n; i = 1, i <= n-1, i++, d = n-i; m = d*Ceiling[m/d+1]]; m); A000960 = Array[b, 12]; Boole[MemberQ[A000960, #]]& /@ Range[A000960 // Last] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Nov 24 2016 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 23 2016
